docs.summary:
A hover box is a container that changes when the mouse hovers over
 it.
description: A hover box has two views: regular and hover. You can
elements to a hover box. Some actions performed on a hover box affect the
elements it contains. For example, [hiding](#hide) a hover box also
effectively hides all the elements in the hover box, although the
values of the [hidden](#hidden) properties of the elements contained in the
